analysis.description: Gorgona.payout (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a5fc826441a16b86aa850b3ddc4b1bc02f21b6c.sol#92-127) allows anyone to destruct the contract
Gorgona.bytesToAddress (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a5fc826441a16b86aa850b3ddc4b1bc02f21b6c.sol) is declared view but contains assembly code

Gorgona.fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a5fc826441a16b86aa850b3ddc4b1bc02f21b6c.sol#44-92) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- user.deposits == 1

Gorgona.payout has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr.transfer(amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4a5fc826441a16b86aa850b3ddc4b1bc02f21b6c.sol#117-118)
